remarks: Define the class of covering maps on two topological spaces.  A function ` f : c --> j ` is a covering map if it is continuous and for every point ` x ` in the target space there is a neighborhood ` k ` of ` x ` and a decomposition ` s ` of the preimage of ` k ` as a disjoint union such that ` f ` is a homeomorphism of each set ` u e. s ` onto ` k ` .
